reviewText: There was nothing new that I haven't seen on Hot Ghetto Mess website. I really wanted to see something new. Overall it was ok.

So they pulled it off--I am a big fan of the website and I never thought they could translate it into a DVD.  Guess I was wrong--this was hard core, funny, entertaining and thought-provoking all at once.  A definite must-have for the DVD collection.  Don't let the name fool you--this is social commentary at its best and in my opinion, we need more of it.  Its true, we got to do better...
